global.text: This is a living project. We are actively developing these frameworks and building our organization. You may encounter broken links or inconsistencies as we refine our work. Thank you for your understanding.

frameworks.text: Note from the Founder: The core concepts and structure of this framework are in place, but it is currently undergoing a detailed revision to improve clarity, consistency, and alignment with our project's strategy. We appreciate your patience, and your feedback during this audit is invaluable.
frameworks.text2: Note on AUBI & Hearts: The implementation details for the Hearts, Leaves, and Love Ledger systems have been significantly refined. For the most current and detailed explanation, please refer to our foundational white paper, 'The Currency of Care: Why Universal Basic Income Isn't Enough.'
frameworks.q42025redraft: This framework is scheduled for a redraft in Q4 2025. The current drafted version does not correspond to our latest outline.
frameworks.q22026redraft: This framework is scheduled for a redraft in Q2 2026. The current drafted version does not correspond to our latest outline.
frameworks.q32026redraft: This framework is scheduled for a redraft in Q3 2026. The current drafted version does not correspond to our latest outline.
frameworks.q42026redraft: This framework is scheduled for a redraft in Q4 2026. The current drafted version does not correspond to our latest outline.

accessibility.text: The GGF is committed to global accessibility through community-led translation.

follow.description: Follow our updates through your preferred method. No email required.

global.note: Built for global accessibility - no email collection, no tracking, open for everyone.
